definition: OPEC/Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
to admire/to look up to/to respect sb greatly
to wear (as accessories)/carry at the waist
Nancy Pelosi (1940-), US Democrat politician from California, speaker of US House of Representatives from 2007

sentences.english: Now, as they came to the Pecos River, the wagon hit a big rock.
sentences.chinese: 现在，当他们来到佩科斯里弗，该车创下了大石头。

sentences.english: Now, Pecos Bill could ride anything that ever was.
sentences.chinese: 现在，佩科斯条例草案将曾经有过骑不了。

sentences.english: Pelham 123, come in, this is Rail Control Center.
sentences.chinese: 佩勒姆123号车，这是行控中心听到吗？

sentences.english: Pecos Bill invented the art of being a cowboy.
sentences.chinese: 佩科斯比尔发明了作为一个牛仔的艺术。

sentences.english: Felipe, you must be pleased with this third on the grid?
sentences.chinese: 菲利佩，你对第三的位置很满意吧？

sentences.english: Juventus are on the verge of closing negotiations for Udinese defender Felipe.
sentences.chinese: 尤文和乌迪内斯正在终结关于后卫菲利佩的谈判。

sentences.english: Olympic refueling for the Chinese jade acclaimed debut Need for the glass to wear.
sentences.chinese: 为奥运加油，为中国玉喝彩，极品玻璃地龙凤佩亮相。

sentences.english: Leroy H Pelton cites a number of studies that have found a strong link between poverty and child abuse.
sentences.chinese: 根据佩尔顿研究指示贫困和受虐儿之间的连结关系。

sentences.english: Peja was recently traded in the last year of his contract to Toronto last month.
sentences.chinese: 佩最近交易在过去的一年的合约到多伦多上个月。

sentences.english: Solucas and Perdiccas in the East. Myself in Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 塞琉古和佩迪克斯在东方，而我则是埃及。

sentences.english: With his gang, Pecos Bill was able to create the biggest ranch in the Southwest.
sentences.chinese: 随着他的团伙，佩科斯条例草案能够创建在西南地区。

sentences.english: Mr Beglitis said the top brass should have gone months ago.
sentences.chinese: 佩格里提斯说，这些高级军官几个月前就该走人了。

sentences.english: Peled predicts the U. S. and other countries won't allow it.
sentences.chinese: 佩莱德预测，美国和其他国家也不会允许它。

sentences.english: Manuel Pellegrini is hoping that Real Madrid can complete their summer spending by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 佩莱格里尼希望这个月底能够完成他们的赛季转会。

sentences.english: No one knows who first told stories about Pecos Bill.
sentences.chinese: 没有人知道谁首先告诉佩科斯比尔的故事。

sentences.english: Try it together with a cold cut platter, and wedges of Pecorino.
sentences.chinese: 可以尝试和冷盘风干肉与佩科里诺干酪一起享用。

definition: surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
to eat/(extended meaning) to endure/putrid smell/vegetables/roots (inextricably attached to the plant)
